parameters: \FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1000Kenji_0003]\FFFF[1010Furea_0004]\N<Kenji>Ah, Flare. It's good to see you, make yourself comfortable.

\AA[F]\M[InL]\F[1000Kenji_0007]\FFFF[1010Furea_0000]\N<Kenji>(I'm glad I had the room tidied up before Flare arrived...
If the commander hadn't passed by at that moment...)
\AA[F]\F[1000Kenji_0012]\FFFF[1010Furea_0000]\N<Kenji>Yeah... let's not think about that anymore...

\FX[F]\AA[F]\F[1010Furea_0008]\FFFFF[1000Kenji_0003]\N<Flare>(Defeated by the enemy and soiled... I can't possibly ask
for such a thing...)
With Flare in cowgirl position, Lv1
if(s[205])With Flare, in cowgirl position, to Lv2
if(s[206]&&s[41])Mount Flare in cowgirl position, Lv3
フレアと騎乗位で Lv1
if(s[205])フレアと騎乗位で Lv2
if(s[206]&&s[41])フレアと騎乗位で Lv3

\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1000Kenji_0000]\FFFF[1010Furea_0003]\N<Flare>This room is...? It's a Japanese-style room, quite different
from mine.

\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1000Kenji_0003]\FFFF[1010Furea_0003]\N<Kenji>Yeah. I like Japanese-style rooms, so I'm pretty grateful
for it.♪
\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1000Kenji_0003]\FFFF[1010Furea_0003]\N<Kenji>Plus, they've put my favorite manga and games here too.♪
\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1000Kenji_0003]\FFFF[1010Furea_0004]\N<Flare>Hehe, it seems Kenji-sama is satisfied, which relieves me.♪
\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\MMMM[jump]\FF[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0003]\N<Kenji>Good job on defeating the monster♪ You're amazing, Flare!♪
\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\MM[no]\FF[1010Furea_0002]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0003]\N<Flare>No, no... It was just luck this time...
\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0002]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0003]\N<Kenji>You don't have to be so modest...
\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0002]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0000]\N<Kenji>I know very well how hard Flare is working.♪

\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1010Furea_0014]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0000]\N<Flare>If you say so, it's also thanks to Kenji-sama who
replenishes my Lavi.
\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0002]\N<Flare>Hehe♪ You don't have to be so modest, Kenji-sama...♪

\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0000]\N<Kenji>Speaking of which, when we returned to the command room,
everyone was praising you!!
\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0000]\N<Flare>Yes. Everyone was pleased, and it made me very happy.

\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0007]\N<Kenji>He claimed to be Flare's type, but he's quite different from
what Flare likes, isn't he? (laugh)

\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0003]\N<Kenji>Good job on defeating the monster♪ It seems to be going
smoothly♪
\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0003]\N<Flare>Yes. It's going smoothly thanks to Kenji-sama♪

\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0000]\N<Kenji>The supreme commander and Eliza praised you too, right? Your
fighting style is good.
\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0002]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0012]\N<Kenji>Speaking of which, I wanted to ask something...

\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0014]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0007]\N<Kenji>About what Guido-san said, about being confessed to by
Flare...

\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\MM[jump]\FF[1010Furea_0003]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0007]\N<Flare>L-look, Kenji-sama. More importantly, it seems an ice cream
shop has opened at the shopping mall.
\FX[FF]\AA[FF]\FF[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0007]\N<Flare>Shall we go eat there together sometime?
\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0003]\N<Kenji>Oh, yeah. Let's go eat there together next time.♪
\FX[FF]\AA[FFFF]\FF[1010Furea_0004]\FFFF[1000Kenji_0004]\N<Kenji>(She seems to not want to touch on that topic...?)
